description: Mobile techniques used by Circles, ATT&CK software S0602 v1.0
name: Circles (S0602)

techniques.comment: [Circles](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0602) can intercept voice calls and SMS messages.(Citation: CitizenLab Circles)
[Circles](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0602) can track the location of mobile devices.(Citation: CitizenLab Circles)
